title: What Is Liver Health
content:
## Interview with Dr. Rachel Simmons, Leading Expert on Liver Health

*Disclosure: This article contains affiliate links. If you choose to purchase through these links, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you. This helps us continue providing free health information.*

**Dr. Rachel Simmons** is a renowned specialist in liver health and digestive wellness. With over two decades of experience in the medical field, she has dedicated her career to helping individuals understand the importance of liver health and how to maintain it through proper diet, lifestyle choices, and supplementation. In this interview, Dr. Simmons shares her insights and expertise on liver health, its significance, and practical tips to keep your liver in top shape.
